game.name: Moving Castle
game.categories: Multi-player, Co-op, LAN Co-op, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A cooperative survival-building adventure where you and your friends gather resources, build and drive your moving home, and explore forests, snowfields, and ancient ruins while facing creatures and challenges in the wild！
game.shortDescriptionEn: A cooperative survival-building adventure where you and your friends gather resources, build and drive your moving home, and explore forests, snowfields, and ancient ruins while facing creatures and challenges in the wild！
